document_data.History:
Bheloris was once a member of the elder's council that advised the Shadowmaster High before [[Dhalgrave]] decided to dissolve it.

In the {{YearlinkName|1358}}, during the hunt for [[Elminster]], Bheloris approached the younger [[Neleyd]] and [[Huerbara]]. He proposed to hatch a plan together to increase the chance of their success for the hunt.
